archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.8b: b) refining the calculated risk range by performing a simulation for each in-scope threat event (e.g. using Monte Carlo methods or other statistical techniques) to determine the most probable risk for that threat event
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
